WorkItem.Description: i have installed it but its not working when i click on the start turbo c++ button

Comments.Message:
Please provide the more details about your system configuration or send the system info report by using following commands.

1. Open cmd
2. Run command systeminfo > systeminfo.txt
3. Find the systeminfo.txt in same path, which showing by your cmd

After generating system report please attach report. Then, I'm able to help you.
